attributes.action: Reduce University Fees from £9250 to £4625 for Student that COVID-19 effected.
attributes.additional_details: Paying for a full education but in reality only getting half as we weren’t allowed to use facilities like lecture halls, workshops, etc is unfair to charge for something that wasn’t used. The fee is ridiculous for lessons being cut short or disturbed by teachers children interpreting lessons and other, not being able to do loads of task as you need use a workshop etc. It was hard on student who rely on facilities to use computer, printer and so on. The government should take action. SIGN SHARE
attributes.background: Reducing university fees to at least half seems only fair as the education during COVID-19 times wasn’t the standard it should of been. As a student myself I know first hand experience that learning online caused loads of problems, eg WIFI not connecting therefore lessons didn’t happen, ect

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Reduce maximum tuition fees by half for any closures due to COVID
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603839
